features: 【All-in-One Karaoke Microphone Toy】Portable hand-held microphones can be used as microphone, karaoke machine, high quality speaker, voice changer, singing recorder. A convenient, multi-functional microphone toy that can bring 3-12 years old girls and boys fun anywhere, anytime.

【Magic Sound + Multi-Colored LED Lights】Advanced 3-layers noise reduction technology will ensure high-quality, crystal-clear sound. Stunning KTV live-sound, and clear music rhythm with echo reverberation. With 4 magic sound modes to change your voice. And circled Multi-Colored LED Lights, LED Lights will dancing with your voice or music, makes party more happy.

【3-Way Connection】The Karaoke Microphone Machine uses the latest Bluetooth 5.0 technology to provide a more stable connection (up to 33 feet), faster pairing (takes only 2 seconds). Compatible with Phone, Pad, PC, etc., play from karaoke speaker via bluetooth, TF card, cable connection(not include).

【Longer Happy Time】 Full-charge ensure kids karaoke microphone get 4-6 hours' playtime from every single charge. Stand-by time more than 20days. Longer use time and more stable, making the singing more free~

【Great Toy Gift for girls and boys】The karaoke microphone toy allows you to listen and sing anywhere, anytime. Suit for kids and adults to practice and share the favorite songs on music app~ A great chioce to send a Amazmic Wireless Karaoke Microphone as a gift on Birthday party!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SHOW YOURSELF & HAVE MORE FUN Amazmic Handheld Karaoke Wireless Microphone Can Do Lots Of Things For You~ As a microphone toy to showcase your talent (singing or humorous MC), cultivate kids’ talent and courage in a relaxed environment from a young age; As a home karaoke machine, so you can sing happily at home anytime; As a Bluetooth stereo to play music; Magic sound function, fun, switch different sounds to make singing more fun.

►Remarkable Sound Quality: Advanced 3--layers noise-deduction reduce noise to smallest, give you incredible using experience. Fluent and loud enough speaker, echo effect also give you a feeling of a live concert. ►Magic LED lights: Built-in LED lights(Red, Blue, Purple), flash with music and your singing. A great gift choice for kids, birthday party, holiday, Christmas. ►Superior Loud Speakers: 5W loudspeakers, less harmonic distortion. It produces a more stunning KTV live-sound and more clear music rhythm with echo reverberation. ►Ergonomic Design: Ergonomic design and comfort grip handles, own incredible comfort and seamless sound that sits effortlessly in your ears. ►Recording Songs: Connect it to your cellphone via Bluetooth, you can sing and record every single word. Professionally tuned microphone, make your songs hear more beautiful. ►Bluetooth Connection & Cable Connection： The karaoke wireless microphone can connect with all Bluetooth devices including Android, iOS smart-phones, PC, laptops and almost all singing APP. Also you can contact microphone via cable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Fun and Entertaining Toy for Young Aspiring Singers
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the Amazmic Kids Microphone in pink for my daughter, and it has been a wonderful gift. It's more than just a toy; it's a fantastic tool for encouraging her interest in music and singing.The microphone is well-suited for young children, with a size and design that are perfect for their smaller hands. The pink color is vibrant and appealing, making it an instant favorite. What truly sets this microphone apart is the voice changer feature, which adds an extra layer of fun and creativity. My daughter loves experimenting with the different settings and performing her own 'concerts' at home.The sound quality is impressive for a kids' toy. It's clear and loud enough for them to enjoy singing along to their favorite songs. The karaoke feature is easy to use, and we've had a great time connecting it to our phone to play music.Durability is important for kids' toys, and this microphone holds up well to regular use. It's survived a few drops and continues to work perfectly.Overall, the Amazmic Kids Microphone is a fantastic gift for young girls who enjoy singing and performing. It encourages creativity, boosts confidence, and provides endless entertainment. Highly recommend as a birthday or holiday gift for kids aged 3-14 years old.

reviews.reviewerName: Easy to use, bright shimmery colors that add a pop to your alcohol ink masterpiece. I have asl used it to create a beautiful effect with acrylic paint.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Self contained microphones
reviews.reviewText: I purchased 2 of these for the little ham bones in the family, colorful metallic, easy to use microphones. These allow anyone to take the “stage” and broadcast their voice. Easy switches, good sound (for what it is), a way to pull out creativity, self assurance in kids. Lightweight enough for kids, sturdy enough to drop and not shatter (I wouldn’t recommend it often). Price point was a bit more than expected, but worth it. Try it, you’ll have fun.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing battery life!!
reviews.reviewText: Wow I’m impressed by the quality of this! I didn’t expect it to work as well it does! My kids love it and frankly I love it too. It has a voice changing and echo feature that is fun to use. It’s loud enough for normal use.But the best thing of all, it has amazing battery life. We charged it once and it’s been going for over two months now with frequent use! Wow!Not too heavy and my little kids can easily hold it and manouver it.Makes a great present!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Idea collection item
reviews.reviewText: These Mikes work too well. All the sound effects are easy to change over. It bit heavy not recommended for little ones, maybe a teenager.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This microphone is easy to use and has a lot of features. My 4-year-old granddaughters use it and love it. They sing in it, they can change the voice so it sounds higher or lower. They can use it as a bluetooth speaker from a phone. It lights up and is easy to charge the battery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun for the entire family
reviews.reviewText: Got this for the kids for Christmas, but then the adults got ahold of it. It’s super fun, connects to Bluetooth, decent sound for the price and the different voices are fun. It would be great if it came with a karaoke app.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We love the MIC🎤
reviews.reviewText: This was such a great Christmas gift for the family. Love how you can change the voices. My kids love music and singing. It was way better than just buying a whole Karaoke machine because the price was reasonable and this Bluetooths right to the TV or phone. I purchased the blue one and it's a real nice color. I will be ordering a couple more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kids love it!
reviews.reviewText: My granddaughter loved it,my son didn't. Lol, it works very well and has clear volume. It's easy to use,and has a lot of features. A little bigger than expected, but my granddaughter didn't seem to mind that at all. She said it looks like a "real" one, like her favorite performer uses. She loves this microphone 🎤 very much. Its of very good quality and will probably last a very long time.
